structure.unit: ARTICLE CIV. STONEGATE COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT DISTRICT

text.section:
Sec. 2-1542. Petition.
The Petition to establish the Stonegate Community Development District over the real property described in Exhibit 1 attached [to the ordinance from which this article derives], which was filed by Landstar Development Corporation, a Florida corporation, on September 30, 2002, and which Petition is on file at the Office of the Clerk of the Board, is hereby granted. A copy of the Petition, attached as Exhibit "B", is set forth in its entirety and incorporated herein.
